title: Genisys Terminator Watch Face
summary: Genisys is Futuristic watch face for Moto 360, LG G Watch R & others
description: Keep an eye out for our others watch face creations that are coming out soon!Follow Us on Twitter !  http://www.twitter.com/elitewatchface  Like Us on Facebook !  http://www.facebook.com/elitewatchface Follow Us on Instagram !  https://www.instagram.com/elitewatchface Follow Us on Google Plus ! https://plus.google.com/b/102084729733615241293It has following featuresModel NumberEF-D25CategoryFuturisticProduct description Genisys  is a Futuristic watch face for all smart watches, a gentle sober touch makes it magnetic  (It has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smart watch 3).it is available for all kind of watches including round and rectangle. it has customization feature which allows you to change watch face needle style (Tick or Smooth).it has following features	Digital Clock	Day	Night Mode	Clouds Animations	Custom Ambient Mode	square & round watches supportAnd it doesn't end yet, follow the new customization options, features and updates, don't forget to make a comment and please kindly leave your feedback and suggestions!(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu) Features: 	Digital Clock	Day	Night Mode	Clouds Animations	Custom Ambient Mode	square & round watches supportConfiguration: 	Turn On / Off Night Mode	Turn On / Off Clouds AnimationsFor Email support Contact us at  elitewatchface@gmail.comTip 1Now we support 280x280 and 320x320 square watchesTip 2✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after re-sync, try these steps:1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)2. Uninstall the watch face3. Restart watch and connect device again4. Then finally install the watch faceTo install:1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Genisys  Watch Face as your watch faceNotePlease, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! Don't give a bad rating too soon. descriptionHTML:
Keep an eye out for our others watch face creations that are coming out soon!
Follow Us on Twitter ! http://www.twitter.com/elitewatchface
Like Us on Facebook ! http://www.facebook.com/elitewatchface
Follow Us on Instagram ! https://www.instagram.com/elitewatchface
Follow Us on Google Plus ! https://plus.google.com/b/102084729733615241293
It has following features


Model Number
EF-D25

Category
Futuristic

Product description

Genisys is a Futuristic watch face for all smart watches, a gentle sober touch makes it magnetic (It has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smart watch 3).it is available for all kind of watches including round and rectangle. it has customization feature which allows you to change watch face needle style (Tick or Smooth).it has following features

 Digital Clock
 Day
 Night Mode
 Clouds Animations
 Custom Ambient Mode
 square & round watches support


And it doesn't end yet, follow the new customization options, features and updates,
don't forget to make a comment and please kindly leave your feedback and suggestions!
(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)



Features:

 Digital Clock
 Day
 Night Mode
 Clouds Animations
 Custom Ambient Mode
 square & round watches support
Configuration:
 Turn On / Off Night Mode
 Turn On / Off Clouds Animations

For Email support Contact us at elitewatchface@gmail.com

Tip 1
Now we support 280x280 and 320x320 square watches
Tip 2
✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after re-sync, try these steps:
1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)
2. Uninstall the watch face
3. Restart watch and connect device again
4. Then finally install the watch face
To install:
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Genisys Watch Face as your watch face
Note

Please, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! Don't give a bad rating too soon. If you experienced a problem, please, send us an email and we will be happy to answer it and fix an issue soon as possible.
Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smart watches...
comments: Still no change. Still 1 star. You've got to give me the option of full ambient mode with color. A beautiful face gets ruined by black and white stand by mode.

I installed the free version and it looks very nice with the blue look but when i upgraded to the animated version it's a lot darker with green text, which doesn't look that nice. Please can you have the original blue text with the animated clouds and i'll give it 5 stars... overall very nice!!
Cool Idea. Any chance you could make a mobile phone version? Would love this on S5.
Awesome Great watch looks cool with animation
Loved it This is so cool. This was from terminator 5 gensys.
Awsme watchface Nice clouds and animation
